scripts.serve:functions: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run shell
scripts.dev: firebase use development && npm run build && firebase emulators:start --import ../firebase-local --export-on-exit
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && firebase use development && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:stg: npm run build && firebase use staging && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && firebase use production && firebase deploy --only functions
